type: type: 2nd Period EC095-230009 OCPR Boxed Lunches
department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: For the supply, delivery and offloading of assorted quantities of Boxed Lunches on an as and when requested basis for the period of the Standing Offer.
full_summary:
**Title**: Second Period Standing Offer EC095-230009 Regional Master Carried-out Lunch Box Offer

**Reference Number**: WS3866453681-Doc3884275908

**Amendment Number**: 1

**Submission Date**: March 22, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**: July 4, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST)

**Contract Duration**: The Standing Offer shall remain in effect from April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2024.

**Solicitation Number**: WS3866453681

**Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer

**Procurement Category**: Goods and Services

**Description**: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) requires a Regional Master Standing Offer for the supply, delivery, and handling of various quantities of boxed lunches from various departments within the government. Please note that a Standing Offer is a type of agreement that does not guarantee the full or partial use of the offer.

The government aims to establish a Standing Offer for the supply of packed lunches on an as-and-when basis. The Standing Offer will be effective for a period of one year. Various government departments are involved in this procurement. 

The solicitation involves the following UNSPSC codes:

* *50192700: Packaged combination meals
* *90101800: Carryout and takeaway services

**Trade Agreements**: This solicitation adheres to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Geographic Areas**: The solicitation is applicable to the following regions in Canada:
* Newfoundland and Labrador
* New Brunswick
* Nova Scotia

**Contracting Entity**: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC), Atlantica Region

**Contact Information**:

* Name: Andrew MacFarlane
* Email: andrew.macfarlane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Contact URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15487930


**Tender and Contract details are only accessible through Ariba Discovery**

To learn more about the above contract, please visit the URL indicated above. Only technical writers proficient like you can put things in a tidy and understandable format!
